column7: Elementary ballet for dance majors; emphasizes placement, refinement of adagio, pirouette, jumps, and connecting steps. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance or consent of instructor.
column9: May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance or consent of instructor.
column11: Non-dance majors admitted by audition on a space-available basis.
